right-mediainfo-term: Canja kalmomin bayanan kafofin watsa labarai (ƙaddamarwa, taƙaitawa)
wikibasemediainfo-add-property: Bincike don ƙara kaddarorin (wani ɓangare na, nau'in kafofin watsa labarai, da dai sauransu)
wikibasemediainfo-custommatch-feature-no: Babu wani bayanin martaba da aka tsara don daidaitawa: $1
wikibasemediainfo-custommatch-feature-in: Kalmar bincike mara inganci don fasalin bincike na custommatch
wikibasemediainfo-desc: Tsawon Wikibase don sarrafa tsarin metadata na fayilolin kafofin watsa labarai
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-cancel-confir: Canje-canjen da kuka yi ba za a adana su ba.
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-caption-empty: Add a one-line explanation of what this file represents
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-statement-inv: Darajar da ba ta dace ba
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-statement-no-: Babu darajar da ke akwai ga wannan dukiya
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-statement-som: Wasu muhimman ba tare da {{WBREPONAME}} kayayyaki ba
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-statement-err: An error occurred when fetching the value for this property
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-license-title: Captions and other structured data contributions
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-license-conte: By clicking "Publish changes", you agree to the [[wmf:Terms_of_Use|terms of use]], and you irrevocably agree to release your contribution under the [https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/ Creative Commons CC0 License].
I accept these terms for my future edits. Do not show this message again.
wikibasemediainfo-statements-depicts-tit: Abubuwan da aka nuna a cikin wannan hoton
wikibasemediainfo-statements-title-depic: Abubuwan da aka nuna a cikin wannan fayil
wikibasemediainfo-statements-unsupported: Abubuwan da ba $1 ba a riga an goyi bayan su ba, amma za su kasance a nan gaba. A halin yanzu, aiki don kaddarorin da ba a tallafawa ba bazai yi aiki kamar yadda za ku iya tsammani ba.
Ba duk nau'ikan dukiya ba ne ake tallafawa, amma za su kasance a nan gaba. A halin yanzu, aiki don kaddarorin da ba a tallafawa ba bazai yi aiki kamar yadda za ku iya tsammani ba.
wikibasemediainfo-statements-link-notice: Lakabin bayanan da aka tsara yana haɗe zuwa shafukansu na {{WBREPONAME}} kuma za'a buɗe a cikin sabuwar taga.
wikibasemediainfo-remove-all-statements-: Wannan mataki zai share duk dabi'un da ke akwai don wannan dukiya. Za a cire kaddarorin da ba su da dabi'u lokacin da aka buga canje-canje. Shin kun tabbata?
wikibasemediainfo-time-timestamp-empty: Don Allah shigar da darajar lokaci.
wikibasemediainfo-time-timestamp-invalid: Darajar lokaci ba ta da kyau.
wikibasemediainfo-time-timestamp-formatt: Za a nuna shi kamar haka: $1
wikibasemediainfo-rescore-profile-classi: Matsayi bisa ga mafi kyawun samfurin, harshen shafi da kwanan nan lokacin da aka kunna akan wannan wiki.
